page.title: 03THE DAY OF A FAIR OAK CHILD
page.content: Every Sunday I wake up at seven 'o clock in the morning and then I get up and have a wash. After that I get into some old clothes so that if I get muddy while I am fishing it will not matter. After I have got dressed, I go down and have my breakfast. I get my fishing gear up together and when everything is in order I set out for my friend Wally's house. When I get to Wally's house I call for him and we go to Mrs.Barnard's lake and set up our rods and start to fish . We stay there all day and leave at six o'clock. When I get home I have my tea and after that I watch television. I go to bed at about half past ten. I like to go fishing because there is not much else to do in Fair Oak on a Sunday.
